channel.title: Apress :: The Expert's Voice
channel.description: Welcome to Apress.com. Books for Professionals, by Professionals(TM)...with what the professional needs to know(TM)

item.title: Excel 2007: Beyond the Manual
item.description: Excel 2007: Beyond the Manual will introduce those who are already familiar with Excel basics to more advanced features, like consolidation, what-if analysis, PivotTables, sorting and filtering, and some commonly used functions. You'll learn how to maximize your efficiency at producing professional-looking spreadsheets and charts and become competent at analyzing data using a variety of tools. The book includes practical examples to illustrate advanced features.

item.title: Word 2007: Beyond the Manual
item.description: Word 2007: Beyond the Manual focuses on new features of Word 2007 as well as older features that were once less accessible than they are now. This book also makes a point to include examples of practical applications for all the new features. The book assumes familiarity with Word 2003 or earlier versions, so you can focus on becoming a confident 2007 user.
